name: Casse-Briks2000
description:
Casse-Briks 2000 is the old game that your parents used to play when they were  young. This time I don't know if your parents would be able to beat it... 

Casse-Briks 2000 is the basic bricks breaker game but HARDER ! 

Would you be the one to beat it ?

------------------------------------------

This game contains:

  • 10 levels.
  • HighScore System to prove your friends that you are better than them.
  • 8 different skins !
  •  A mute button to mute the great music (it is "M")
  • A pause menu to take a pee time after all those levels !
  • A lot of frustration !

------------------------------------------

The great cover was made by: @kimi_kroll
